description: Login ViewModel requires the Authentication Service to function.
mitigation_plan: Develop service interface first to allow for parallel UI development with a mock service.

description: The full GPU rendering control depends on the successful outcome and learnings from the DirectX spike.
mitigation_plan: The spike itself is the mitigation. Contingency is to pivot to a CPU-based rendering approach if the spike fails.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks all viewer-related features, which is the core of the application.

description: UI bindings for authorization depend on the backend Authorization Service.
The study persistence consumer processes data received by the SCP listener.
mitigation_plan: These tasks will be developed in the same sprint.
impact_if_delayed: DICOM ingestion feature will be incomplete.
